body_content.explanation: in a way that happens very easily without anything to make it slower or more difficult:
examples: The system can quickly detect attacks, but only when the tools work with each other frictionlessly.
The app allows content to be frictionlessly shared across social media platforms.

body_content.explanation: in a way that does not involve any friction (= the force that makes it difficult for an object to slide across or move through something):
examples: This little gadget will ensure that your drawers slide in and out frictionlessly.
The bolt slid frictionlessly into position.
